text: I almost killed myself but I failed at the end Below is my suicide note My phone is dying and so will I soon  I ve found a nice high bridge  I look forward to feeling the wind in my hair before I die I don t want to feel pain  sadness or be hurt ever again  I had a decent night and I want my last night here to be decent  I m so sorry for being annoying and weird  I understand that you and everyone else tolerated me out of pity and I thank you for that  Knowing you allowed me to feel more comfortable in my own self and I thank you for that  You were there when  I didn t want to keep going  you kept me breathing and sane But for once in my life I want to be selfish  I hate myself   I have always hated myself  my dearest wish was to have died before I could have been hurt   Hopefully we will meet in the afterlife wherever and whenever that will be  I hope I have the courage to take the leap and I don t back out like I have before My phone is now at   and I hope I have the power to send this  I d hate to leave without a proper good bye Thank you  sorry and good bye I failed at the end and I still don t know what to say to my best friend who i sent the note to
summary: Suicide note was written by a person who almost killed himself. He is sorry for being annoying and weird. He doesn't know what to say to his best friend who he sent the note to. He hopes they will meet in the afterlife.

text: I hope you ll understandI need a break from all this  The past   months have taken a huge toll on me  My mental health is really bad but I don t tell anyone because I don t have anyone to share my emotions with  I know this is whiny and bitchy but it is how it is  I feel like writing this down will help you understand more easily that none of which you see is your fault  Its mine    From the past   weeks I ve been crying myself to sleep in the silence and solemn of my room  The only one who sees me cry is probably the mirror opposite to my bed  It seems like nobody cares  Even if they do  it will take a lot to see through the fa ade I put on  that I m happy and nothing is wrong  I don t want you to suffer because of me  I make a consious effort to not look like my world is falling apart     I ve tried to hang myself twice  The first time the knot opened and the second time I slipped from the noose  Even the universe is playing a joke on me  Nobody  not even you  know about this  I don t want those fake sympathetic looks from people who KNOW it will be better with me gone The truth is  I m just an after thought for most people I know  Even the closest ones  My death will probably feel bad for a week or a month at most  After that  they ll just move on and their lives will be   times better without my burden    Life is not for the weak or the dumb  Its the survival of the fittest  And my death will be in accordance with nature    I failed you and I failed myself  I can not ask forgiveness for that since that is of no use  I do  however  apologize for putting this on a public forum  and the mess on the floor  Do me a favor and return the gun to its owner  The poor guy probably still thinks I ve gone hunting       Bye
summary: The past months have taken a huge toll on him. He has tried to hang himself twice, the first time the knot opened and the second time he slipped from the noose. He doesn't want sympathy from people who know it will be better with him gone. He apologizes for putting the mess on the floor and the gun on the forum.
cleaned: past month take huge toll try hang twice time knot open second time slip noose not want sympathy people know well go apologize put mess floor gun forum
